title: Dreamland Beach Getaway (Half-day)
overview: Relax on white sands, enjoy surf breaks, and take in stunning sunset views at Dreamland Beach.

stops.description: Arrive and relax on the sand or try surfing.
Enjoy a snack or drink at a beachfront venue.

title: Dreamland Beach & Surf (Full-day)
overview: A full day of surfing, sunbathing, and sunset at Dreamland Beach.

stops.description: Surf or relax on the white sands.
Swim, sunbathe, or explore nearby cliffs.
Watch the sunset before heading back.
